name: Belgian Waffles
description: Trio waffles served with pieces of white and milk chocolate chunks on top and vanilla ice cream and chocolate fondue on side

name: Crack Pie
description: 2 pieces of buttery pie in crust cookies, served alongside vanilla ice cream and white chocolate fondue

name: Cheesecake
description: Two pieces of cheesecake, served with vanilla ice cream and chocolate fondue

name: Munchie - Gluten free
description: Two pieces of layered almond crunch, peanut butter cream, toffee and dark chocolate ganache coated with chocolate crust. Served with vanilla ice cream and chocolate fondue

name: Milky Max Trio
description: The milky trio, Oreo, banoffee and lotus flavor. Served with a jar of milk fragments and a jar of waffle balls

name: Six Cookies
description: Chocolate Puree, Oreo and Chocolate Chips 2 of each kind, served with vanilla ice cream and white chocolate fondue
